description: This file is a C header (.h) defining interfaces for a message bus component in a software system, including function prototypes for initializing, finalizing, engaging, checking, and freeing resources related to a message bus.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Function to engage or initialize the message bus with component ID, configuration file, and path.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Function to initialize the message bus or related system, taking user data as parameter.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Function to finalize or clean up the message bus or system, with user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Function to check the status of the message bus, with user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Function to free resources with a specified priority and user data.
